inclusion.criterion: Patients with moderate to severe aortic stenosis (AVA < 1.5 cm2)
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: repeat echo confirmed critical aortic stenosis showing left ventricular hypertrophy

inclusion.criterion: Diastolic dysfunction as evidenced by tissue Doppler e' (average of septal and lateral) ≤ 7 cm/s
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: None or minimal symptoms related to aortic stenosis (NYHA ≤ 2)
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: He was sent home from cardiology clinic with Lasix and BB (which he did not tolerate)

inclusion.criterion: The subject and treating physician are not planning on a valve replacement procedure to occur during the next 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to comply with all the requirements for the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Moderately severe or severe mitral regurgitation
